reviews.author: Chanita N.
reviews.text:
I am a 4th floor resident that work 12 hr shifts and this is what I have come home to, and it's an ongoing problem.... 4 story parking garage that is at max capacity, having to park a 5+ min walk away just to get to my building in 40 degree weather (this was 1 of 2 remaining spots on the ENTIRE property... front & back)
I have went to the leasing office, voicing my concerns & requested a walk through of the parking garage this past week, as there are many abandoned vehicles and vehicles with expired registrations & I am looking forward to a cleanup. It has been 2 days and the vehicles are still there, so we shall see.
Meanwhile, I have had a vehicle towed due to the only spot being available was a handicap spot and had to pay a $350 private property impound out of pocket as they offer no waiver when the complex was at max capacity for regular parking, and the PORR management has decided to take no ownership over the issue.
It's a shame because I truly enjoyed living here up until this point. I shouldn't have to worry, as a paying resident, if I will find parking on my way home from work everyday. Tow abandoned vehicles! Stop letting guests park for a max of 3 days! Where am I to park the next time it is full again? The hotel parking lot down the street? Bass Pro Shops? Take your hard earned money to a complex that truly cares about their residents.
reviews.response_text: Hi - I'm disappointed to hear you had a negative experience at our community. If there's anything else you'd like to share, please don't hesitate to contact us directly.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Move in experience was good! Thanks to Bella, Alyssa, and Valerie all my questions were answered and any maintenance issues I’ve had were taken care of quickly!
reviews.response_text: Hi - thank you so much for the positive review! We'll be sure to let the rest of the team know, too. At Parkside at Round Rock, it's our pleasure to serve. Hope we can be off assistance to you in the future! Best wishes from Parkside at Round Rock.

reviews.author: Destini W.
reviews.text: The property is beautiful with nice amenities. The gym is very big with lots of variety. The units are quite expensive compared to other apartments around and the patio space is fairly small. I was not a fan of paying extra for storage especially with it being far from my unit. The area is also pretty loud and busy. I had an issue with a break in, but keep in mind the are.There is a tight parking garage with the occasional homeless people nearby. The complex has potential but the circumstances are rough.
reviews.response_text: Hi, we regret to hear that you had a negative experience with us but would appreciate the chance to turn your experience around. We would like to work towards a resolution, so if you are willing, please reach out to us at (512) 388-5000 to discuss this further.

reviews.text: A great place to call home. The entire staff always greets everyone with a smile and are very helpful to my needs, and are quick to attend to any problems. I love the convenience of the elevator and four story covered parking garage. It could not be better located and is surrounded by lots of shopping plaza’s, restaurants, hospitals, and schools. I just love it here!

reviews.text: My wife and I have lived here for 2 years now. The first year was fine but then the complex was bought by avenue 5. reviews.author: Alma N.
reviews.text:
I am more than positive that all the five star reviews and positive talk about this apartment complex are fake. The management must be submitting them to counteract all the negative reviews. 
By far the worst apartment complex with management staff that can exist. For the love of everything holy, do not move here. The key fob system is broken and they are doing absolutely nothing to fix it. Homeless people and others under the influences walk into this apartment to seek refuge, which can cause grave danger to the residents. Do not, DO NOT move here!
reviews.response_text: Hello, We appreciate the time you took to leave us feedback. We pride ourselves on maintaining the highest quality standards for our customers but we didn't measure up. reviews.text: Apartments are okay. Workmanship was poor upon move in, felt like the office didn't really care, since move in there's been a lot of turnover and feels as if staff cares less. Getting mail or packages is a mess. Maintenance guys are friendly but busy and haven't resolved any of my requests. Like having a yard for my dog.
reviews.response_text: User, We want to thank you for taking the time to give feedback about your recent experience. Please accept our most sincerest apologies. reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Would not recommend. Management is awful. Complex is dirty. Feels incredibly unsafe considering RRPD or swat is there frequently.
reviews.response_text: Hello User, Thanks for rating your experience. Allow me to apologize on behalf of our team. We hope you will consider visiting us again so we can turn your experience around. Sincerely, Parkside at Round Rock Staff

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: I discovered after move that there is constant exposure to dog excrements, in the elevator, hallways, entryways, & grass area. This includes odor. Yes, there are property rules regarding pets. However, I have observed most tenants w/dogs, completely ignore those rules. They let their pets do their business wherever they want, and of course, they don't clean it up. This property simply has no logical way to control all of these dogs, and their owners disregard for rules. Yes, I do think the property works hard to do so, but in my view, it is not working. They're outnumbered. Perhaps in time, it will straighten out. The same is true for the garbage situation. Currently, there is a trash valet service. However, when I first moved in, people were just throwing their garbage wherever they felt like on the property. (I'm dead serious.) Now, with the valet service, it's the same thing. Tenants just haul their smelly, disgusting garbage bags out into the hallway. This causes smells within the hall. (I can't even imagine what it's going to be like in the hot weather.) Worse yet, tenants are throwing their full garbage bags out into the hall, onto the floor,  some 23  hours in advance, or days in advance, before any valet pick up. Truly disgusting. So one is just inches from these garbage bags, when walking down the hall. In this age of covid, it is not healthy. Anything could be in those trash bags - human body fluids, or chemicals. Hazardous fumes can come out of the bags. So can bacteria. The trash cans provided are completely ignored by tenants. No one uses them & puts the lid on, like they're supposed to for their garbage. Again, it's the same scenario. Management is outnumbered. There are just too many tenants doing it, and not enough monitoring. So, if you decide to rent here, just know that you have to have a strong stomach. There's a lot of bad smells from garbage & pet waste. Other than that, I feel my apartment is truly gorgeous, and that the amenities are beyond reproach.The staff are all amazing, wonderful, hard-working individuals. It is a gorgeous property --- yet could certainly be better, if tenants took better care of it. Mgmnt. is here to govern the paperwork, to lease these beautiful apartment homes to folks. They are NOT here to babysit your pets, or police your garbage. This is not adult daycare. Tenants should have enough common decency AND brains, to know how to behave w/their garbage and pets. However, they do not.~

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Parkside is definitely a spot to live if you love simplicity, but also updated luxury living. It is very quiet, very clean, and upkept even as a newer complex. You will enjoy the smoke free facility and the simple walk across the street to the Round Rock premium outlets, as well as Bass Pro Shops a block away. The leasing staff is very formative and are willing to help accommodate your every need.
reviews.response_text: Hello User, Thank you for the awesome feedback. It's feedback like yours that reminds us why we do what we do. If you ever need anything please don't hesitate to reach out to our team. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Easy move-in process with the help of staff. The complex amenities look great, I love the gym area! The location itself is overall a quiet community, Id highly recommend!

reviews.author: Z C.
reviews.text: Since purchased by Avenue5, this property has fallen more into disrepair and poor management.  Mail room is overflowing, noise is too much from other apts, and the traffic is horrible.

reviews.author: Sojourner S.
reviews.text: I have almost no words to describe how fantastic this apartment complex is. From the great amenities, to the quiet, easy  living, fresh walking breeeways, beautiful grounds, & large parking garage to keep cars out of the elements -  I was truly impressed. The leasing agents are professional and super nice to work with. The entire staff makes everything so easy for move-in. Great online "space" to pay rent and request work orders. Beautiful apt, with wood floors. (no messy, dusty carpet.) I definitely recommend these apartments.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: The best apartment living experience I have had in my entire life. Phenomenal amenities, clean, pretty grounds. Easy living. Professional leasing agents. Quiet. You cannot hear noises from other apts, probably due to layout and perhaps building materials? Location is centralized to shopping. Phenomenal apt living!

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Living here is the second worst place Ive ever lived all the doors are broken. The key fob entry remains a joke. My storage unit was stolen from a previous employer that kept a master key. And my AC is being controlled by the office. It shuts off or gets turned up in the middle of the night.  Yet, I pay my bill, not them. The front desk person (Antwon) might be the most absolute worst customer service rep I have ever encountered. Hes completely dismissive of any concerns. All he wants to do is ignore any complaints or concerns. He acts as if its his first day every day. Not to mention that nobody ever replies to emails nor answers the phones.   I dont know what any of them do all day, but its not help their residents or get property issues resolved.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: The location is ideal and the apartment is a very nice value for the amenities in place. As a new complex (bout a year maybe less), the growing pains have been addressed adequately. Workout room is amazing and pool is very nice.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: It is a beautiful property but it is clear the few people who don't want to live here and follow the rules and try to keep the property in the best condition and respect their neighbors it is ruining the quality of life here. Until these issues are addressed there's no reason to refer or commend this property. The owners need to allow the PM to manage this property. Provide resources to clean this up and maintain.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: I love this place. It perfectly meets my needs. I feel safe in this community. I recommend it to any one looking for a home.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Its convenient for its closeness to where I work; and there are plenty of places to shop nearby as well as many restaurants.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Its a good place to reside. I have been here for 10 months and really am not considering moving anytime soon.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Do not live here unless you love dogs. They are everywhere. Pooping and barking everywhere. And the new management could care less.

reviews.author: Ryan Michael J.
reviews.text:
I had several people warn me about moving into this complex before I moved in. During my first few weeks here, I also noticed that even residents who live here seemed hesitant when walking me through the community. I tried to stay optimistic, but things have continued to go wrong.

They have repeatedly messed up my rent, and I’ve had to go into the office multiple times to get it corrected. The hot water regularly goes out. Trash valet does not run nearly as smoothly as advertised. There are homeless individuals living in the dumpster area, and until very recently, there was no nighttime security at all. To be clear, they just hired nighttime security a couple of days ago, after months of ongoing issues reported by residents.

There are no security cameras in the hallways or parking lots because management claims it would be an “infringement of privacy,” even though residents have repeatedly asked for basic safety measures. Packages go missing almost daily, despite management insisting their mail delivery system is “foolproof.” It isn’t. Someone’s car was stolen (not towed—stolen) from inside the gated parking lot.

The parking areas are constantly littered with residents’ dog poop. I personally had a package stolen from the mailroom, and management admitted they have video footage of a homeless man entering and stealing packages. On top of that, my rental vehicle was towed even though I had a valid visitor permit.

I’ve lived here for less than two months and have experienced an unbelievable number of issues. There is an entire resident group chat that is nothing but daily complaints about how poorly this place is managed. I truly tried to stay positive and go with the flow, but I’m exhausted by the constant problems and the lack of meaningful action from management.

I do not recommend moving here.
reviews.response_text: We are concerned to hear about these ongoing issues. Your safety and satisfaction matter deeply. Please contact us at (888) 219-9471 to discuss solutions.

reviews.author: Valerie F.
reviews.text: Great location, amenities, and staff. Would definitely recommend
reviews.response_text: We are delighted to hear about your positive experience. Thank you for highlighting our location, amenities, and staff.

reviews.author: Rachel H.
reviews.text: Just moved in and was welcomed with a pup cup and a cookie which was a nice surprise. My apartment had one issue with the garage disposal but a maintenance man was able to come the same day to fix it. Nice office staff and the neighbors seem nice!
reviews.response_text: We are overjoyed to hear about your positive experience at Nexus East! Thank you for sharing your feedback.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: One of the coolest pool areas in East Austin. I have been to a lot, and none are as beautiful as here. The landscaping and maintenance of the pool is great. Pool is huge. 2 grill areas. Lots of seating. Cleaning crew comes early in the mornings to deep clean everything. Pool is consistently vacuumed and cleaned. Most apartment pools in Austin get pretty gross. Not the case here. Good sun exposure during the summer months from about 11am to 7pm. My girlfriend and I are at the pool pretty much everyday from June - September.
reviews.response_text: Your feedback is incredibly valuable. Thank you for sharing your experience with the pool area at Nexus East. We are glad to hear that you enjoy the landscaping and maintenance of the pool.

reviews.author: AJ W.
reviews.text:
I moved in and within days was having problems with my ac which they were slow to fix. Shortly after that there was a rain storm that leaked through my ceiling and created a huge mold stain. It took them
a couple days to get the leak sealed up but nothing got done about the mold. They said I could wait weeks for a new unit and then dragged their feet trying to move me into something else within a reasonable amount of time. I was eventually allowed to terminate my lease after a week of being lied to and pushed to the side. They tried to tell me I owed them money and kept my deposit and I had to cover all move out expenses. Management never once made me feel like more than just a number.
reviews.response_text: We regret to learn about your experience with us. Please contact us at (888) 219-9471 to discuss this further.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Nexus east is in the perfect location on the east side. The apartments are very cute and up-to-date, Along with a very friendly community.
reviews.response_text:
Hello -

Thank you so much for your feedback! We strive to provide a great experience here at Nexus East and are happy that we've been able to provide one for you, including with our maintenance team! Please feel free to reach out to us again in the future with additional feedback!

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: The managent dragged their feet implementing a new gate system which allowed a homeless man to enter the complex and bang on doors trying to get in. Packages are stolen. There are roaches everywhere. And there is a widespread mold issue. Every unit is humid and there is no hot water.
reviews.response_text: Apologies for any inconvenience. Your feedback is valuable to us. Please contact us at (888) 219-9471 to discuss your concerns further.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: The complex is well kept, great amenities, provides a few welcoming areas to meet people in the complex. Easy access to gates and doors with the app.
reviews.response_text: You're the best! We really appreciate the positive review. Thanks again for taking some time to provide feedback about Nexus East. If there is anything we can assist you will please feel free to contact us we are here to help! - Nakeiya

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Love it at Nexus East! It's got a great vibe and in a good location!
reviews.response_text: Hey - what a lovely thing to say! We appreciate you so much. Can't wait to see you again. Take care!

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Truly feels like home! Management team has been awesome and it’s such a great community to be apart of.
reviews.response_text: So good to hear from you! Thanks for letting us know. Have a great day! Thanks again for taking some time to about your visit to Nexus East. Be well!

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Nexus is a wonderful community and the staff is always helpful.
reviews.response_text: Thank you again for taking the time to let us know how we did. We hope you have a great day!

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: Nexus does the absolute bare minimum. Being negligently reactive instead of proactive about problems residents are dealing with. Where is our money going towards??
reviews.response_text: We would like to have a better understanding about your experience. Please reach out to us at (512) 389-5369 at your earliest convenience and we will do our best to resolve this with you.

reviews.author: Verified R.
reviews.text: It’s a lovely complex in a great location. I just wish it was guest-friendly. I work 12-hr days Emergency Management Services and love having friends and family visit for a few days at a time but I’m not available to be with them their whole visit to unlock and lock my unit door and to leave it unlocked like I what was suggested by the leasing agent, doesn’t feel right. I do not want my guests to feel like they are an inconvenience when that shouldn’t even be an issue. Butterfly app is great to gain entry in the property but not my unit. I want my guests to feel welcomed and I know they do not/will not.
reviews.response_text: Hello, we really appreciate your feedback! Please feel free to contact the leasing office to discuss with the community manager. Have a great weekend.
